login.title: Dashboard for Powerfox
login.hero: This site does not store any credentials on servers. Your Powerfox credentials remain only in your browser (secure HttpOnly cookie) and are not stored in any database or on our systems.
login.cardDescription: Connect your Powerfox account to monitor your energy consumption in real time.

dashboard.title: Dashboard for Powerfox
dashboard.subtitle: Current energy data from the API · No credentials stored on servers
dashboard.footer: Live data from API · Auto-refresh every 60 seconds · No credential storage on servers

settings.title: Powerfox Settings
settings.description: Enter your Powerfox account credentials to connect your devices.
settings.errorEmailPassword: Please enter both email and password

sync.title: Fetch data manually from API
sync.subtitle: Select an endpoint and fetch data from the Powerfox API into the database
sync.alertCredentials: Please configure your Powerfox credentials in settings first.
sync.deviceFromDbHint: Choose a saved device or enter the ID manually
sync.noParamsRequired: This endpoint does not require parameters
sync.successMessage: Data fetched and saved to DB! ({saveType})

endpoints.allDevicesDesc: Fetches all devices and saves them to DB

reports.title: Historical Reports
reports.subtitle: Analyse stored data from the database
reports.noData: No data for the selected filters.
reports.selectDeviceAndRange: Select a device and date range.
reports.syncHint: Data must be loaded into the DB first via the Sync page.
reports.noDataForPeriod: No data stored in the database for this period.

reportsTimespan.title: Timespan Average Report
reportsTimespan.subtitle: Analyse average consumption for a specific time of day over a longer period. Uses the Powerfox API with correct parameter combinations.
reportsTimespan.configDescription: Select device, period and time for analysis
reportsTimespan.yearHint: Required. Returns monthly values for the year.
reportsTimespan.monthHint: Optional. With year: returns daily values for the month.
reportsTimespan.dayHint: Optional. With year + month: returns hourly values for the day.
reportsTimespan.errorCredentials: Please configure your Powerfox credentials in settings first.
